front.title: Applicability of NAT-PMP with Service Provider Deployments of Network Address Translation

abstract.t: In an effort to conserve global scope IPv4 address allocations, service providers are deploying network address/port translators in their interior routing domain and assigning private addresses to residential and small office subscriber sites. This document discusses the applicability of NAT-PMP is such networks to support application requiring dynamic TCP and UDP port forwarding.
